name: Stall Extinction
description:
Update:

Fixed duplicates in resolution dropdown.

Fixed a bug where pressing spacebar while in game toggled full screen.

Made the south door more distinguishable.

Added more sound effects.

Earth has been destroyed, you are among the few selected to go on a voyage across space in search of a new habitable replacement to continue the human race. All was well and you have found a suitable planet, but before you could begin entry, your ship came under attack. In the panic and mayhem you locked yourself in a storage room, ignoring the please and cries of your comrades...now they are silenced and the room is filled with the sounds of the intruders attempting to break in.

How to play:

Controls:

wasd - movement

Q - Door shock(Resets amount of damage doors are taking)

E - Interaction

R - Use speedboost

Space - Use welder

Esc - Open pause menu

Keep the doors health up (Green, Yellow, Red).

Clean up Sludge with a mop on the bottom left corner.

Use monitor in the bottom right to fill oxygen.

Use panel in the top right to turn lights back on.

Known Issues:

Game does not currently support widescreen monitors.

Fixed for next update:

Duplicates in resolution dropdown. (The duplicates are the different refresh rates)

Pressing spacebar in game toggles full screen.
